> \* What's with this "Newsletter" thing that pushes all the actual content to the left? What's wrong with <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>? Can I turn this off?

If you are using any of the custom KSP forum themes from userstyles.org, (there are several browser extensions besides Stylish that can use them), then you should be able to add this snippet to the CSS, to make that column on the right, containing the ""Newsletter" box, disappear:  

    /* remove right sidebar column on Activity pages */
       #ipsLayout_sidebar 
       {display: none;
       }

I'm messing around trying to address some of the other issues you mentioned, and a few other repositioning/resizing/cutting out wasted space stuff in a few other places, in my Darkblack KSP Forum Theme.
